prov:entity.attribute:comment: Impose an instantaneous quadrupling of CO2, then hold fixed. Other forcings are fixed at the values of pre-industrial control run. The model initial state is from the 281-year of pre-industrial control simulation.

prov:entity.attribute:description: This recipe evaluates the equilibrium climate sensitivity (ECS) and the transient climate response (TCR) for various CMIP generations.

prov:entity.attribute:caption: Scatterplot between TOA radiance and global mean surface temperature anomaly for 150 years of the abrupt 4x CO2 experiment including linear regression to calculate ECS for BCC-CSM2-MR (CMIP6).

prov:entity.attribute:comment: Impose an instantaneous quadrupling of CO2, then hold fixed. Other forcings are fixed at the values of pre-industrial control run. The model initial state is from the 281-year of pre-industrial control simulation.
